title: King of Glory, King of Peace

verses.text: King of glory, King of peace, I will love Thee; And that love may never cease, I will move Thee.
Wherefore with my utmost art I will sing Thee, And the cream of all my heart I will bring Thee.
Seven whole days, not one in seven, I will praise Thee; In my heart, though not in heaven, I can raise Thee.

refrain.text: Thou hast granted my request, Thou hast heard me; Thou didst note my working breast, Thou hast spared me.
